name: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho: Natsu-basho
summary: Takara-hai Oozumou Eisei Basho is a port of Oozumou Tamashii for the Satellaview which had SoundLink support. It is a sumo fighting game, which was accompanied by a live broadcast. The gameplay is divided into two parts; the player does the training in the first half, while real matches begin in the second half. Scores are counted according to the kinds of used techniques. A voice guide is provided by Kiyoko Taniguchi.
